title: Riot could you help me out?
body: Hello Riot!I was invited to PBE(Public Beta Environment)I did download the PC client to my PC.Here comes the question.Where can I creat a pbe account?Could you help me?Thanks!

replies.body: I looked into this for you and see that you've already created a PBE account with the account you're posting from now.  If you need help recovering it, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We don't want to share account information on a public venue like this boards, but we'll be happy to help individually in a ticket.  Hope that helps!
